title: BastionEvent
description: Unified event schema for all Bastión Xólot detection events emitted by the edge agent

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the event occurred

source.description: Detection module that generated this event (e.g. discovery, dns_monitor)

device_id.description: MAC address of the associated device, if applicable

data.description: Event-specific payload — varies by event type

metadata.description: Additional context (agent version, gateway hostname, etc.)
